reason: Question asks about school admin office duties (학교 행정실에서 처리하는 업무) but answer only dumps regulation text about cross-province teacher transfer principles without addressing admin tasks. Answer is a raw paste of source text with a header prepended.
DUPLICATE_ANSWER with q_1_0633. Same source.text, identical answer body (only intro sentence differs). Also a raw source dump with no synthesis.

DUPLICATE_ANSWER with q_1_0633 and q_1_0634 (triplicate). Question specifically asks about exceptions/special provisions (특이사항이나 예외 규정) but the answer provides the same generic regulation text without identifying any exceptions.

Natural question about exchange posting period. Answer accurately states 2 years (non-extendable), conditions, selection priority (4 categories), return assignment rules, and 벽지 가산점 exclusion. All verified against page 45 source. Well-synthesized with table and structured sections.

Natural question about tie-breaking for transfer rankings. Answer accurately lists all 8 priority items from page 45 in correct order. source.text verified as substring of page 45. Answer is concise and well-formatted.
DUPLICATE_QUESTION and DUPLICATE_ANSWER with q_1_0637. Question is nearly identical (얼마나 되나요 vs 얼마인가요) and answer covers the same core content (2년, 연장불가, conditions, 복귀 후 임지, 벽지 가산점).

DUPLICATE_QUESTION and DUPLICATE_ANSWER with q_1_0637 and q_1_0639 (triplicate). Same topic (교환근무 기간), same source text, same answer content covering period, conditions, selection priority, and return assignment.
DUPLICATE_ANSWER with q_1_0638. Both questions ask about tie-breaking when transfer rankings are equal (전출 순위가 같을 때 vs 동일한 경우) and both answers list the same 8 priority items.
DUPLICATE_ANSWER with q_1_0637/q_1_0639/q_1_0642 (quadruplicate). Same topic of exchange posting period (2년, 연장불가), same source text, substantially overlapping answer content.

Distinct question focused specifically on selection criteria for exchange posting candidates (대상자 선정 순위). Answer accurately lists all 4 categories with detailed requirements from page 45 (라) section. source.text verified. Well-synthesized with bold headers and sub-details.
